block.p: HOLLAND-Fay (Brodkin). On October 11th, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Samuel, loving mother of Bernice Schargel (Sol) and Gerald Holland (Phyllis), loving grandmother of Gail Powell, Pam Montgomery and Allison Holland, dear great-grandmother of Sam, Grace, Kate, Emma and Jake. Loving sister of Berta Gapin and the late Anna Guberman and Ben Brodkin. Graveside service Friday, October 13, at 11 A.M. at Union Field Cemetery, Cypress Avenue, Ridgewood, New York.
